title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand bug 8142 regarding the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
OB: When I try to view the type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the type hierarchy of a binary project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant). 
2. Attempt to view the type hierarchy of the project.
